Posts.Content: May 2, 2018 07:38PM - edited May 2, 2018 07:39PM by siddhivinayak Tina2 i have read that ground glass nodules are almost impossible to be associated with lung mets from breast cancer.Ground glass opacities are associated with lymphangitic lung mets but ground glass nodules are found in case of lung cancer mets.

Posts.Content: Jun 1, 2018 10:29PM siddhivinayak wrote: Hi Lousiana.Lung mets causes symptoms in some cases but in some caSes it doesnt cause symptoms.These symtoms may be of lung mets but before ct or pet it is very difficult to say.
